General.Name: Tourmaline Oil Corp.
General.Description: Tourmaline Oil Corp. explores for and develops oil and natural gas properties in the Western Canadian Sedimentary Basin. It holds interests in properties located in the Alberta Deep Basin, Northeast British Columbia Montney, and the Peace River High Triassic oil complex. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 250-6th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 3H7

1.Name: Mr. Brian G. Robinson
1.Title: VP of Fin., CFO & Non-Independent Director
